venues.name: Empower Field
venues.description: The home of the Denver Broncos, this football stadium can host up to 60,000 concert-goers.

venues.name: Coors Field
venues.description: The home of the Colorado Rockies, this baseball stadium can host up to 50,000 concert-goers.

venues.name: Fiddler's Green Amphitheatre
venues.description: The largest outdoor amphitheatre in the Denver metropolitan area, with a capacity of 18,000 people.

venues.name: Red Rocks Amphitheatre
venues.description: Forming over 200 million years, Red Rocks is the only naturally-occurring, acoustically perfect amphitheater in the world, with a capacity of 10,000 people.

venues.name: Levitt Pavilion
venues.description: A 7,500 person outdoor concert venue, that offers a free concert series every year.

venues.name: Dillon Amphitheater
venues.description: A spectacular lakeside venue over-looking the majestic Rocky Mountains, with a capacity of 6,500 people

venues.name: Gerald R. Ford Amphitheater
venues.description: A spectacular, intimate venue that can host 2,565 guests.

venues.name: Mishawaka Amphitheatre
venues.description: A legendary 1,000 person music venue located next to the Poudre River.
